SEARCH
Package com.example.donotredeem

Class MoodEventAdapterTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.donotredeem.MoodEventAdapterTest
public class MoodEventAdapterTest extends Object
Unit tests for the MoodEventAdapter focusing on data management and adapter operations without Android UI components. Verifies proper handling of mood event data and list operations.

Key test areas include:

  • Adapter initialization and item count management
  • Data retrieval and field validation for mood events
  • Item removal functionality and list consistency
  • Edge cases with empty adapter states

Uses a custom MoodEventAdapterTest.TestMoodEventAdapter to bypass Android framework dependencies.

  • Constructor Details

    • MoodEventAdapterTest

      public MoodEventAdapterTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Initializes test environment before each test:
      • Creates two test MoodEvent instances with varied data
      • Configures test adapter with these events

    • testAdapterCreation

      public void testAdapterCreation()
      Tests adapter initialization. Verifies:
      • Successful adapter instance creation
      • Correct initial item count (2 events)

    • testGetItem

      public void testGetItem()
      Tests item retrieval by position. Validates:
      • Non-null returns for valid positions
      • Correct field values for first event (emotional state, username, time, date)

    • testGetItemId

      public void testGetItemId()
      Tests item ID generation logic. Verifies position-based IDs match:
      • 0 for first position
      • 1 for second position

    • testGetCount

      public void testGetCount()
      Tests item count reporting. Validates adapter correctly tracks:
      • Initial count (2 items)
      • Count changes after modifications

    • testEventDetails

      public void testEventDetails()
      Tests complete field integrity of stored mood events. Verifies all fields for both test events including:
      • Emotional state, place, explanation text/picture
      • Situation, trigger, privacy settings
      • Null handling for optional fields

    • testRemoveItem

      public void testRemoveItem()
      Tests item removal functionality. Validates:
      • List size reduction after removal
      • Proper item exclusion from the list

    • testEmptyAdapter

      public void testEmptyAdapter()
      Tests empty adapter state handling. Verifies:
      • Successful adapter creation with empty list
      • Correct reporting of zero items
